Reviews.Title: “worst hotel experience ever”
Reviews.Author: jwilber2
Reviews.Content: After 6 p.m., hotel was locked down tight, no night bell, no phone number with English speaking assistance, given the wrong phone number for English aid and it was difficult to deal with the owners. We were unable to get in and were still charged 80% of overall bill since we didn't cancel 7 days in advance. We are still disputing thier charges. This is NOT a hotel that we would recommend to ANYONE!

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Gotland
HotelInfo.Address: Franzstrasse 23 | Lankwitz, 12247 Berlin, Germany
